Name: block_trips_with_overlapping_stop_times
Human_Readable_Description: Trips within the same block have overlapping stop times, which is not allowed.

Name: csv_parsing_failed
Human_Readable_Description: The validator was unable to parse a field. This is typically caused by a cell containing more than 4096 characters.

Name: decreasing_or_equal_shape_distance
Human_Readable_Description: Two consecutive points in shapes.txt should have increasing values for shape_dist_traveled. If the values are equal, this is considered as an error.

Name: decreasing_or_equal_stop_time_distance
Human_Readable_Description: Two consecutive stop times in a trip should have increasing distance. If the values are equal, this is considered as an error.

Name: duplicate_fare_rule_zone_id_fields
Human_Readable_Description: Each of the following fields should be unique in fare_rules.txt: fare_rules.route_id, fare_rules.origin_id, fare_rules.contains_id and fare_rules.destination_id

Name: duplicate_key
Human_Readable_Description: The values of the given key and rows are duplicates.

Name: duplicated_column
Human_Readable_Description: The input file CSV header has the same column name repeated.

Name: empty_file
Human_Readable_Description: Empty csv file found in the archive: file does not have any headers, or is a required file and does not have any data. The GTFS specification requires the first line of each file to contain field names and required files must have data.

Name: foreign_key_violation
Human_Readable_Description: The values of the given key and rows of one table cannot be found with values of the given key in another table.

Name: inconsistent_agency_timezone
Human_Readable_Description: Agencies from GTFS agency.txt have been found to have different timezones.

Name: invalid_color
Human_Readable_Description: A color is coded incorrectly. A color must be encoded as a six-digit hexadecimal number. The leading "#" should not be included.

Name: invalid_currency
Human_Readable_Description: Value of field with type currency is not valid. Currency code must follow ISO 4217.

Name: invalid_date
Human_Readable_Description: A date is coded incorrectly. Dates must have the YYYYMMDD format.
What_to_Report: If calendar or calendar_dates. File name, row by service_id, and field contents. If feed_info: File name and field contents.

Name: invalid_email
Human_Readable_Description: A field contains a malformed email address.

Name: invalid_float
Human_Readable_Description: A field cannot be parsed as a floating point number.

Name: invalid_integer
Human_Readable_Description: A field cannot be parsed as an integer.

Name: invalid_language_code
Human_Readable_Description: A field contains a wrong language code. Language codes must follow IETF BCP 47.

Name: invalid_row_length
Human_Readable_Description: A row in the input file has a different number of values than specified by the CSV header.

Name: invalid_time
Human_Readable_Description: Value of field with type time is not valid. Time must be in the H:MM:SS, HH:MM:SS or HHH:MM:SS format.

Name: invalid_timezone
Human_Readable_Description: Value of field with type timezone is not valid.Timezones are defined at www.iana.org. Timezone names never contain the space character but may contain an underscore.

Name: invalid_url
Human_Readable_Description: A field contains a malformed URL.

Name: location_without_parent_station
Human_Readable_Description: The following location types must have a parent station: entrance, generic node, boarding_area.
What_to_Report: Row by stop_id if under 10; otherwise a count of affected rows

Name: missing_calendar_and_calendar_date_files
Human_Readable_Description: Both files calendar_dates.txt and calendar.txt are missing from the GTFS dataset. At least one of the files must be provided.

Name: missing_required_column
Human_Readable_Description: A required column is missing.

Name: missing_required_field
Human_Readable_Description: A required field is blank.

Name: missing_required_file
Human_Readable_Description: A required file is missing.

Name: missing_trip_edge
Human_Readable_Description: First and last stop of a trip must define both arrival_time and departure_time fields.
What_to_Report: Row by trip_id if under 10; otherwise a count of affected trips.

Name: new_line_in_value
Human_Readable_Description: A value in CSV file has a new line or carriage return.

Name: number_out_of_range
Human_Readable_Description: The values in the given column of the input rows are out of range.

Name: overlapping_frequency
Human_Readable_Description: Trip frequencies must not overlap in time.
What_to_Report: Row by trip_id if under 10; otherwise a count of affected trips.

Name: route_both_short_and_long_name_missing
Human_Readable_Description: Both short_name and long_name are missing for a route. At least one is required.

Name: same_name_and_description_for_route
Human_Readable_Description: The GTFS spec requires that a route_description is distinct from both the route short and long names.

Name: start_and_end_range_equal
Human_Readable_Description: Date or time fields have been found equal.

Name: start_and_end_range_out_of_order
Human_Readable_Description: Date or time fields have been found out of order.

Name: station_with_parent_station
Human_Readable_Description: Field parent_station must be empty when location_type is 2 (entrance/exit).
What_to_Report: Rows by stop ID if fewer than 10, otherwise a count of affected rows

Name: stop_time_with_arrival_before_previous_departure_time
Human_Readable_Description: The departure_time must not precede the arrival_time in stop_times.txt if both are given.

Name: wrong_parent_location_type
Human_Readable_Description: Value of field location_type of parent found in field parent_station is invalid. Stops, Platforms, Entrance/exit, and generic nodes can only have a Station as a parent. Boarding Area can only have Platform as a parent. Stations cannot have a parent. All other combinations are prohibited.

Name: duplicate_route_name
Human_Readable_Description: All routes of the same route_type with the same agency_id should have unique combinations of route_short_name and route_long_name.

Name: empty_column_name
Human_Readable_Description: A column name has not been provided. Such columns are skipped by the validator.

Name: empty_row
Human_Readable_Description: A row in the input file has only spaces.

Name: feed_expiration_date
Human_Readable_Description: At any time, the published GTFS dataset should be valid for at least the next 7 days, and ideally for as long as the operator is confident that the schedule will continue to be operated. If possible, the GTFS dataset should cover at least the next 30 days of service.

Name: more_than_one_entity
Human_Readable_Description: A file that is expected to have only one row has more than one row.

Name: non_ascii_or_non_printable_char
Human_Readable_Description: A value of filed with type id contains non ASCII or non printable characters. This is not recommended.

Name: platform_without_parent_station
Human_Readable_Description: A platform has no parent_station field set.
What_to_Report: Row by stop_id if fewer than 10, otherwise count affected rows

Name: route_short_and_long_name_equal
Human_Readable_Description: Short and long name should not be identical.

Name: route_short_name_too_long
Human_Readable_Description: Short name of a route is too long (more than 12 characters). Note that major trip planning applications start truncating short names after seven characters.

Name: start_and_end_time_equal
Human_Readable_Description: The start_time and end_time in frequencies.txt should not match, or block IDs will not be able to represent linked trips.

Name: stop_time_timepoint_without_times
Human_Readable_Description: Any record with stop_times.timepoint set to 1 should define a value for stop_times.arrival_time and stop_times.departure_time fields.

Name: stop_too_far_from_trip_shape
Human_Readable_Description: Per GTFS Best Practices, route alignments (in shapes.txt) should be within 100 meters of stop locations which a trip serves.

Name: too_fast_travel
Human_Readable_Description: As implemented in the original Google Python GTFS validator, the calculated speed between stops should not be greater than 150 km/h (42 m/s SI or 93 mph).

Name: unexpected_enum_value
Human_Readable_Description: An enum has an unexpected value.

Name: unusable_trip
Human_Readable_Description: A trip must visit more than one stop in stop_times.txt to be usable by passengers for boarding and alighting.
What_to_Report: rows by trip_id if fewer than 10, otherwise a count of affected rows
